text: Pedro Ferreira may refer to: *Pedró Ferreira (footballer, born 1987), Portuguese footballer *Pedro Ferreira (footballer, born 1991), Portuguese footballer *Pedro Ferreira (footballer, born 1998), Portuguese footballer *Pedro Ferreira (swimmer) (born 1977), Portuguese swimmer *Pedro G. Ferreira (born 1968), British/Portuguese astrophysicist and author
title: Pedro Ferreira
